metadata.description: Intent mappings for TunaCode agent system - documents the purpose and semantic intent of key functions after the major refactor

process_request.purpose: Main entry point for all agent requests - coordinates the entire agent processing lifecycle
key_responsibilities: Handle completion detection and fallback responses
Manage state transitions and recovery mechanisms
process_request.error_handling: Robust exception handling with request context preservation

get_or_create_agent.purpose: Create and cache agent instances with proper configuration

ResponseState.purpose: Track agent processing state using enhanced state machine
ResponseState.completion_detection: Integrated with state machine for robust completion tracking

AgentStateMachine.purpose: Thread-safe state machine for agent processing transitions
AgentStateMachine.validity_rules: Pre-defined transition rules prevent invalid state changes

execute_tools_parallel.purpose: Execute multiple tool calls in parallel for performance optimization
execute_tools_parallel.batching_strategy: CPU count based batching with environment override
execute_tools_parallel.error_handling: Return exceptions rather than raising to allow partial success

ToolBuffer.purpose: Buffer read-only tools for batched parallel execution
ToolBuffer.buffering_logic: Groups read-only tools, executes write tools immediately
ToolBuffer.performance_benefit: Significant speedup for multiple read operations

ReactTool.execute.purpose: Record think/observe notes and expose session scratchpad controls

ForcedReactSnapshot.purpose: Schedule react snapshots and inject guidance system prompt into the next LLM request
ForcedReactSnapshot.semantic_role: Iteration hook that drives ReactTool and injects guidance

_process_node.purpose: Process individual agent response nodes and coordinate tool execution
processing_pipeline: Parse model response for tool calls
Execute tools directly or via buffering

check_task_completion.purpose: Detect task completion markers in agent responses
check_task_completion.processing: Removes markers and returns cleaned content

_handle_empty_response.purpose: Handle cases where model produces empty responses
_handle_empty_response.strategy: Inject guidance prompt to force meaningful action

_force_action_if_unproductive.purpose: Force agent action when stuck in unproductive loops
_force_action_if_unproductive.message: Direct instruction to take action or mark complete

_build_fallback_output.purpose: Generate comprehensive summary when task doesn't complete
_build_fallback_output.content: Summary of actions, progress, issues, and next steps

parse_json_tool_calls.purpose: Parse JSON-formatted tool calls when structured calling fails
parse_json_tool_calls.error_handling: Robust retry logic with custom exceptions

load_system_prompt.purpose: Load and cache system prompts with file watching
load_system_prompt.caching: Multiple cache levels with time-based invalidation

get_model_messages.purpose: Provide compatibility layer for message classes across environments
get_model_messages.environment_adaptation: Works with both real and test environments

stream_model_request_node.purpose: Stream model tokens for real-time response display
stream_model_request_node.availability: Optional - gracefully handles missing streaming support
stream_model_request_node.ui_integration: Coordinates with rich console for live updates

StateFacade.purpose: Centralize session state access and mutations
StateFacade.safety: Safe getters and setters with error handling
StateFacade.progress_tracking: Iteration counters and empty response tracking

AgentState.purpose: Define agent processing states as enum

PlanPhase.purpose: Define plan mode phases as enum

refactor_intent_summary.architectural_shift: From triple redundancy to single source of truth
key_improvements: Modular component system with clear responsibilities
Enhanced state machine with enum-based transitions
Robust error handling and recovery mechanisms
Improved performance through parallel tool execution
Better separation of concerns and maintainability
refactor_intent_summary.semantic_clarity: Each function has a clear, documented intent and purpose
refactor_intent_summary.backward_compatibility: Maintained through facade patterns and legacy flags
